A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many plot hole is this story\, no cohesion with the story and mysteries laid out in the first film\, characters betray there core beliefs with no back story as to why\, the force works different now than how it used to. Characters are added that serve no purpose to the film\, the tension\,mystery and excitement of the OT and that of TFA is gone. Not sure where they go from here\, and sadly i don't care anymore.
